description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 redefines mobile computing with its foldable design and multitasking capabilities.
details: This flagship device features a 7.6-inch main Dynamic AMOLED display and a 6.2-inch cover screen. It supports S Pen and offers powerful multitasking with Android-based One UI.

description: The Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max delivers cutting-edge performance with an advanced camera system and A18 chip.
details: Equipped with a 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR display, the iPhone 16 Pro Max includes 5x optical zoom and enhanced AI photography. It runs on iOS 18 with dynamic island and always-on display.

description: The Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold brings premium folding tech and AI-powered features into one sleek package.
details: Featuring a massive 8.0-inch foldable OLED display and a 6.3-inch cover screen, it's powered by Tensor G4 chip and includes advanced health sensing and real-time translation.

description: The OnePlus Ace 3 Pro is a performance beast with fast charging and immersive gaming features.
details: It features a 6.78-inch QHD+ AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution and 120Hz refresh rate. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, it also includes 100W HyperVOOC fast charging.

description: The Xiaomi 14 Ultra is a flagship smartphone designed for photography enthusiasts with Leica optics.
details: It comes with a 6.73-inch WQHD+ AMOLED display, triple Leica cameras, and ultra-fast wired/wireless charging. The titanium frame gives it a premium feel.

description: The Sony Xperia 1 VI is built for creators with cinema-grade color accuracy and pro-level audio tools.
details: Features include a 6.5-inch 4K HDR OLED display, triple-lens camera with 85mm telephoto, and Dolby Atmos sound. Runs on Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 with IP68 rating.

description: The Oppo Find X7 Pro combines elegance with high-end specs, including a periscope zoom lens and curved AMOLED display.
details: It features a 6.82-inch AMOLED LTPO display with 120Hz refresh rate, triple rear camera setup with 5x optical zoom, and 100W SUPERVOOC charging.

description: The Vivo X100 Pro+ is a powerhouse with Zeiss optics, large battery, and ultra-fast processor.
details: Boasting a 6.8-inch 2K AMOLED display, triple camera system with 100x digital zoom, and powered by MediaTek Dimensity 9300+, this phone is built for speed and performance.

description: The Realme GT Neo 6 Pro offers flagship-level performance at a mid-range price point.
details: It features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with 144Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, and 100W fast charging. Great for gamers and power users.

description: The Honor Magic 6 Pro blends luxury with innovation, featuring top-tier specs and a stunning display.
details: Equipped with a 6.81-inch OLED display, triple camera setup with OIS, and powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, this phone is perfect for multimedia and photography lovers.
